text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/9898107f54a330c6d9629976250a393169c698ca|patch 8.2.1314: Vim9: rule for comment after :function is confusing>
patch 8.2.1314: Vim9: rule for comment after :function is confusing

Problem:    Vim9: rule for comment after :function is confusing.
Solution:   Allow double quoted comment after :function in vim9script.
            (closes #6556)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1314: Vim9: rule for comment after :function is confusing · vim/vim@9898107
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1314: Vim9: rule for comment after :function is confusing · vim/vim@9898107
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: rule for comment after :function is confusing. Solution: Allow double quoted comment after :function in vim9script. (closes #6556)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/45df2a01a79d562b59949383f79625bb8bd89a69|patch 8.2.1315: MS-Windows: test log contains escape sequences>
patch 8.2.1315: MS-Windows: test log contains escape sequences

Problem:    MS-Windows: test log contains escape sequences.
Solution:   Do not use t_md and t_me but ANSI escape sequences. (Ken Takata,
            closes #6559)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1315: MS-Windows: test log contains escape sequences · vim/vim@45df2a0
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1315: MS-Windows: test log contains escape sequences · vim/vim@45df2a0
attachments.text: Problem: MS-Windows: test log contains escape sequences. Solution: Do not use t_md and t_me but ANSI escape sequences. (Ken Takata, closes #6559)

<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/ae616494d77e9930da703d65d12ac0abf6dc425f|patch 8.2.1308: Vim9: accidentally using "x" causes Vim to exit>
patch 8.2.1308: Vim9: accidentally using "x" causes Vim to exit

Problem:    Vim9: accidentally using "x" causes Vim to exit.
Solution:   Disallow using ":x" or "xit" in Vim9 script. (closes #6399)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1308: Vim9: accidentally using "x" causes Vim to exit · vim/vim@ae61649
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1308: Vim9: accidentally using "x" causes Vim to exit · vim/vim@ae61649
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: accidentally using "x" causes Vim to exit. Solution: Disallow using ":x" or "xit" in Vim9 script. (closes #6399)

Solution:   Add #ifdef.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/b5ed266037dea49024e00c4e1f9c89f3a9ebaa60|patch 8.2.1313: Vim9 script: cannot assign to environment variable>
patch 8.2.1313: Vim9 script: cannot assign to environment variable

Problem:    Vim9 script: cannot assign to environment variable.
Solution:   Recognize environment variable assignment. (closes #6548)
            Also options and registers.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1313: Vim9 script: cannot assign to environment variable · vim/vim@b5ed266
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1313: Vim9 script: cannot assign to environment variable · vim/vim@b5ed266
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9 script: cannot assign to environment variable. Solution: Recognize environment variable assignment. (closes #6548) Also options and registers.
